summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Newport Avenue from Grand Avenue to 38th Avenue; 38th Avenue from a point 155 feet south of East Union Street to East Spring Street; and from East Spring Street to Norwood Place; Grand Avenue from Newport Avenue to East Spring Street; East Spring Street from 38th Avenue from the south to Lakeside Avenue; Randolph Avenue, from 37th Avenue to East Marion Street, and from East Columbia Street to Norwood Place; East Marion Street from 37th Avenue to 38th Avenue; East Columbia Street from 37th Avenue to Lakeside Avenue; 39th Avenue, from East Columbia Street to Wellington Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2839 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
